tooltips.toolName: Tool name must be lowercase with underscore. For example: my_tool
tooltips.toolDescription: Description of what the tool does. This is for the ChatGPT to know when to use this tool.
tooltips.inputSchema: What's the input format in JSON?
tooltips.javascriptFunction: Function to execute when the tool is used. You can use properties specified in Input Schema as variables. For example, if the property is userid, you can use it as $userid. Return value must be a string. You can also override code from API by following this guide

dialog.inputMustBeArray: Input must be an array of properties
dialog.invalidJSONFormat: Invalid JSON format. Please check your input.

placeholders.toolDescription: Description of what the tool does. This is for ChatGPT to determine when to use this tool.

dialog.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this tool?

function.useLibraries: You can use any libraries imported in Flowise
function.usePropertiesAsVariables: You can use properties specified in Input Schema as variables with prefix $:
function.getFlowConfig: You can get default flow config:
function.returnString: Must return a string value at the end of function
